Texts.Chs: 把^orange;麦芽^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给我。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;malt^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 很好。如果你需要黑麦芽，只需要把麦芽放入^orange;篝火^reset;可以了。
Texts.Eng: Nice. Note that if you need dark malt, you just need to put back your malt into the ^orange;Furnace^reset; and cook it some more.

Texts.Chs: 现在是时候来点高科技了。首先，把1份^orange;小麦^reset;放到^orange;雨水收集桶^reset;里。浸湿后放到^orange;植物分析台^reset;上。最后把发芽的小麦取出，放进^orange;篝火^reset;里。
Texts.Eng: Time to use some new stations. First, put one piece of ^orange;Wheat^reset; into the ^orange;Rain Barrel^reset;. Once it's soaked, put it into the ^orange;Sprouting Table^reset;. Then take your sprouted wheat and place it into a ^orange;Campfire^reset;.
